      • check

        public boolean check(CharSequence plainTexPassword,
                     String hashed)
        Description copied from interface: HashingFunction
        Checks if the CHF generated the hash starting from the plaintext password.

        This method must be used when the salt is part of the hash. If the CHF expects a salt separated from the hash, an UnsupportedOperationException is thrown.

        In case the CHF expects a salt to be part of the hash, if the format of the hash is not valid (e.g. the CHF cannot recognise a valid salt) a BadParametersException is thrown.

        Specified by:
        check in interface HashingFunction
        Overrides:
        check in class PBKDF2Function
        Parameters:
        plainTexPassword - the plaintext password
        hashed - the hash
        Returns:
        true if the hash is generated from the plaintext; false otherwise

      • check

        public boolean check(CharSequence plainTextPassword,
                     String hashed,
                     String salt)
        Description copied from interface: HashingFunction
        Checks if the CHF generated the hash starting from the plaintext password and the salt.

        This method must be used when the salt is not part of the hash.

        If the format of the hash is not valid (e.g. the CHF cannot recognise a valid salt) a BadParametersException is thrown.

        Specified by:
        check in interface HashingFunction
        Overrides:
        check in class PBKDF2Function
        Parameters:
        plainTextPassword - the plaintext password
        hashed - the hash
        salt - the salt used to produce the hash
        Returns:
        true if the hash is generated from the plaintext; false otherwise

        protected static String[] getParts(String hashed)
